name: Daish Assault - The Videogame
description:
In 2017, the terrorists attacked Russia and you are to liberate it. The game has three levels, on each of which you need to neutralize the radio communication points of terrorists. In the game more than 150 models, 5 weapons, 5 models of terrorists that are modeled in GameGuru Character Creator. The game has many ways to go, a balanced level of complexity. The first level represents the major cities of Russia, the second level of its forest and village, the third level is its cities in the mountains.

Video:  

System requirements:

OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz RAM: 2 GB of RAM Video card: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Versions 9.0c Disk space: 1 GB Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

Control keys:

- Mouse - for review; - W, A, S, D - for movement; - PKM - to shoot; - 1, 2, 3, 4, the mouse wheel - the choice of weapons; - 0 - remove weapons; - F - on-off. flashlight; - Shift - run; - Spacebar - to jump; - F11 - show FPS.
